original_text: So the man came to the house and unharnessed the camels, and gave straw and fodder to the camels, and there was water to wash his feet and the feet of the men who were with him.
korean_text: 그 사람이 그 집으로 들어가매 라반이 낙타의 짐을 부리고 짚과 사료를 낙타에게 주고 그 사람의 발과 그의 동행자들의 발 씻을 물을 주고

sentences.original_text: So the man came to the house
and gave straw and fodder to the camels
and there was water to wash his feet
and the feet of the men who were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있던 사람들의 발을 씻을 물도 있었습니다.
